headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From CoStar’s Q2 Earnings Call
summary: CoStar’s second quarter saw solid execution, with revenue and non-GAAP earnings both surpassing Wall Street expectations, prompting a positive reaction from the market. Management attributed this performance to strong growth across its core platforms—including Apartments.com, Homes.com, and LoopNet—driven by substantial investment in expanding sales capacity and ongoing product enhancements.
